content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs instructed, I used the command "google" with the query "Rosetta Stone download link". The command returned a list of links, including one to the Rosetta Stone website.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.rosettastone.com/", "question": "What is the download link for the Rosetta Stone software?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide a download link for the Rosetta Stone software. It describes the language learning program and its features, including courses in 25 languages, real-world scenarios, interactive activities, and feedback on pronunciation. The text also includes success stories from Rosetta Stone users and information about the company and its products. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.rosettastone.com/)', 'For Individuals (https://www.rosettastone.com/buy/)', 'For Enterprise (https://www.rosettastone.com/business/)', 'For Schools (https://www.rosettastone.com/schools/)', 'Join Now (https://www.rosettastone.com/subscriptions/)']"}]
"""
